vtta-dndbeyond.image-upload-directory.hi: Specificies the avatar upload location on the server, relative to the Foundry /Data directory, e.g. 'img/uploads' is '[Foundry]/Data/img/uploads'. Create this directory on the server manually.
vtta-dndbeyond.entity-import-policy.name: Entity import policy (GM only)
vtta-dndbeyond.entity-import-policy.hint: Defines if imported items should be saved into the compendiums below, and under which circumstances. Important note: Please use a world-specific compendium or a designated sharing module (like https://www.vttassets.com/asset/shared) as a target to avoid data loss on updating.
vtta-dndbeyond.entity-import-policy.0: Save all entities, overwrite existing ones
vtta-dndbeyond.entity-import-policy.1: Save new entities only, do not overwrite existing ones
vtta-dndbeyond.entity-import-policy.2: Do not save the entities at all
